page.title: 05Creca Women's Institute
page.content: Creca SWRI formed in 1928 has thirty members, who pay Â£2.50 yearly. We invite speakers to talk about crafts; and show films on travel, public service and Nature. These give us all 'food for thought'. We have many talented members and have won cups at local shows. We also have competitions each month, for a handicraft and household article, for which prizes, and a Cup, are given for the highest points. Three members provide refreshments for each meeting, during which the SWRI magazines from HQ are handed out. They cost 25p and make enjoyable reading. We have parties for members' children , a Social Evening, Coffee Evenings and an evening trip in June. At our May Business Meeting we appoint a new Committee of 12 members. Meeting are held from September to May , with members from a wide area.
